metadata.title: CVE-2020-1738 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible Engine when the module package or service isused and the parameter 'use' is not specified. If a previous task isexecuted with a malicious user, the module sent can be selected by theattacker using the ansible facts file. All versions in 2.7.x, 2.8.x and2.9.x branches are believed to be vulnerable.

criterions.comment: ansible package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
